item.title: 01 Getting Up - Jeff's
item.description: 01 Getting Up - Jeff’s GLOSSARY to get up â€“ to get out of bed; to leave oneâ€™s bedÂ This morning I got up very quickly because the baby was crying.

item.title: 01 Getting Up - Lucy's
item.description: GLOSSARY to get up â€“ to get out of bed; to leave oneâ€™s bedÂ He didnâ€™t get up until 11:00 this morning, because he was up late last night reading in bed.

item.title: 02 Cleaning Up - Jeff's
item.description: STORY I go into my bathroom sometime around 6:45 a.m. My sink and medicine cabinet are on the left when you enter my bathroom.

item.title: 02 Cleaning Up - Lucy's
item.description: STORY I share a bathroom with my roommate, which is usually not a problem. We each try to keep the sink, the tub, and the toilet clean, and we have separate medicine cabinets to keep our things.

item.title: 0452 Dealing with Unhappy Employees
item.description: BODY 0452 Dealing with Unhappy Employees Asa: I donâ€™t know how we got stuck with reviewing employee complaints.

item.title: 05 Taking Public Transportation to Work - Lucy's Day
item.description: Story I like my job but it takes over an hour to get there from my part of town. First, I walk three blocks to the subway station and swipe my monthly pass to get through the turnstile.

item.title: how to set up your first R2S equipment
item.description: How to set up your first R2S system Plug in the power cable let it play When you open your package, you will see an R2S mini machine and a set of power cables with the charger.

item.title: Taking Subway to Somewhere and buy a ticket remember
item.description: Misha: Iâ€™d like to buy a token for the subway. Clerk: The subway doesnâ€™t use tokens anymore. ^5133b8 Misha: Oh? I didnâ€™t know that.

item.title: What is the shortcut key of your sublime&Skim latex compiler
item.description: what is the clockwise search shortcut key? Press Command+l and then, press j what is the counterclockwise search shortcut key? Press Command+Shift at the same time , press left click of your mouse.
